about_the_game:
Celebrate the beginning of Inkbound’s tale with The Story Begins Supporter Pack DLC. This cosmetics pack is the perfect way to level up your look and impress fellow party members. The DLC supports the future development of Inkbound, while also getting your hands on exclusive cosmetic upgrades.

The DLC Contains:

5 Legendary Aspect Cosmetic Sets

  • Magma Miner - Armor of Vulkus Set
  • Mosscloak - Celestial Gemthief Set
  • Clairvoyant - Raven Ringleader’s Set
  • Weaver - Azulian Set
  • Obelisk - Cosmic Crest Set

Additional Cosmetics

  • 14 Helmets
  • 25 Weapons
  • 25 Emotes and Dances
  • 9 Head Effects
  • 5 Trail Effects
  • 3 Kwills
  • 1 Supporter UI Nameplate

The DLC content will be added to your cosmetic inventory after purchasing and entering the Atheneum or a run while online.

Note: If you bought The Story Begins Pass in-game during Early Access before October 27, 2023 then you already own this content.

By buying this DLC, you are supporting us and the development of future updates and content. From everyone at Shiny Shoe, thank you!

short_description: The Story Begins Supporter Pack rewards your support with a wide variety of exclusive cosmetic items to customize your look. It includes armor sets, weapons, helmets, and plenty of fancy visual effects to spice up your dives through the books of the Inkbound world.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
